i like video games.

participant_2.background:
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to spend time with my kids and show them my collection
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done.
I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate my birthday with friends.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
she died when i was 18.

content.text: Hi! I like to play video games too!
Nice! What kind of games do you like?
I like lots of different types of games, but I really like playing RPGs.
RPGs are fun! I like playing them too.
Do you have a favorite RPG?
I really like the Elder Scrolls series.
Oh yeah, those are great games! I have played a few of them.
I've played all of them. They're so much fun!
They are. I love the open world and the freedom you have to explore.
Me too! That's one of the things I like most about them.
I'm looking forward to the next Elder Scrolls game.
Me too! It's been a long time since the last one.
I hope it's worth the wait.
